item.title: Mona add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mona add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "We have to allow ourselves to be loved by the people who really love us, the people who really matter. Too much of the time, we are blinded by our own pursuits of people to love us, people that don't even matter, while all that time we waste and the people who do love us have to stand on the sidewalk and watch us beg in the streets! It's time to put an end to this. It's time for us to let ourselves be loved." -- C. JoyBell C.

item.title: Mona add a quote by محمد إقبال
item.description: "أشد ما أثّر في حياتي نصيحة سمعتها من أبي: يا بني اقرأ القرآن كأنه أنزل عليك!" -- محمد إقبال

item.title: Mona add a quote by محمد إقبال
item.description: "القلب الذي يعشق و يصبر ليس سوى حجر فبين العشق و الصبر ألف فرسخ" -- محمد إقبال
